metadata.title: CVE-2021-39239 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability in XML processing in Apache Jena, in versions up to 4.1.0, may allow an attacker to execute XML External Entities (XXE), including exposing the contents of local files to a remote server.

criterions.comment: apache-jena package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
